title: Did Clint Eastwood Say Obama Was the “Biggest Fraud Ever Perpetrated on the American People”?
subtitle: Eastwood made something approximating this remark in 2012, following his appearance in support of Mitt Romney at the Republican National Convention.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Clint Eastwood said "one day we will realize that the Barack Obama presidency was the biggest fraud ever perpetrated on the American people.”
